name: RDP Over Reverse SSH Tunnel
description: Detects svchost hosting RDP termsvcs communicating with the loopback address and on TCP port 3389
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND network.direction:/[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]/ AND source.port:3389) AND (destination.ip:/127\..*/ OR destination.ip:\:\:1))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND network.direction:true AND source.port:3389) AND (destination.ip:127.* OR destination.ip:\:\:1))`
